Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI allowed me to complete work checks quicker and reduced the time I had to spend on assignments.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The feedback was pretty similar in sometimes they made me feel confident and others made me feel lost.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI was often easier to access and allowed for instant feedback. It was sometimes difficult to word the questions so that the AI would respond in the right way.
